stellar-agent-kit

Unified SDK for Stellar: payments, DEX (SoroSwap), lending (Blend), oracles. One class, initialize(), then protocol methods. Mainnet only.

Quick start

import { StellarAgentKit, MAINNET_ASSETS } from "stellar-agent-kit";

const agent = new StellarAgentKit(process.env.SECRET_KEY!, "mainnet");
await agent.initialize();

const balances = await agent.getBalances();
await agent.sendPayment("G...", "10");
const quote = await agent.dexGetQuote(
  { contractId: MAINNET_ASSETS.XLM.contractId },
  { contractId: MAINNET_ASSETS.USDC.contractId },
  "10000000"
);
await agent.dexSwap(quote);

Methods

  • initialize()Call once after construction. Sets up Horizon, DEX, oracle.
  • getBalances(accountId?)Native + trustline balances.
  • sendPayment(to, amount, assetCode?, assetIssuer?)Send XLM or custom asset.
  • createAccount(destination, startingBalance)Create and fund a new account.
  • pathPayment(sendAsset, sendMax, dest, destAsset, destAmount, path?)Path payment strict receive.
  • dexGetQuote(from, to, amount)Swap quote (SoroSwap aggregator).
  • dexSwap(quote)Execute swap from a quote.
  • dexSwapExactIn(from, to, amount)Quote + execute in one call.
  • getPrice(asset)Reflector oracle price.
  • lendingSupply(args) / lendingBorrow(args)Blend protocol.

Install: npm install stellar-agent-kit. Set SECRET_KEY and SOROSWAP_API_KEY for DEX.
